member.name: M:JsonFormatterPlus.JsonFormatter.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a 'pretty printed' version of the specified JSON string, formatted for human consumption.
member.returns: A 'pretty printed' version of the specified JSON string.

member.name: M:JsonFormatterPlus.JsonFormatter.Minify(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a 'minified' version of the specified JSON string, stripped of all non-essential characters.
member.returns: A 'minified' version of the specified JSON string.
